tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was overwhelming experience with Dr Ashwini Mam. And is the fact that, It's very rare to find a doctor like Dr Ashwini Mam, very special, highly qualified, committed, innovative, expert in all latest medical technologies/procedures, highly experienced, commendable and approachable, explains very clear on the situation and advises only required treatment.
Day 1, we met Dr Ashwini Mam, we found the hope, trust and got a confidence that, we are in right and safe hands.
Dr Ashwini Mam is very kind, transparent, swift,understands the problem very well and directs the concrete, crisp, and right treatment. Also explains the anticipated/probable chances very clearly.
One important point, measures the risk very well and mitigates with all possible precautionary medicines/procedures to reduce the risk at the maximum.
At times, when situation is little critical, Dr Ashwini Mam is more concerned than anyone. Mam is always very supportive, provides instant plenty of solutions/options with medicines/alternative to medicines to avoid any side effects.
What we observed and realized that, always there is a solution for all your problems with Dr Ashwini Mam, and you realize it one by one which we could’t in earlier hospitals.
Wholeheartedly thanks to Dr Ashwini Mam for the life time gifts(We blessed with Angel & Prince).Absolutely no words to express, like us, think how many families got the gifts, really it’s a pride, gratitude, much pleased to be lucky to get the treatment/care under Dr Ashwini Mam.
Take this opportunity to thank Dr Narmatha Mam for all your treatment,scans, support, care, for everything, thank you Mam.
Also, would like to thank all the staff who supported all the way and helped in each phases. Always treated us as Aspire Family members, very polite, supportive, experienced and demonstrating solidarity, smilefull posture is a key motive of Aspire staff and its the indication of right place, Doctors and faculty and feel the confidence of positive hope. Dr. Ashwini Mam has not only given us a ray of hope, but also gave smile on our face to be blessed and cherish for the rest of our life.
We cannot forget how each phases the Dr Ashwini Mam shown us a kindness, care and support is really a pride and blessed. My words will be countless to express my gratitude, thank you for everything and we wish you a very all the best for all future endeavors, wishing to fulfill/achieve all your ambitions, dreams comes true Mam.
Happy Parents
Amruta & Shivasharan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We started our journey with Dr. Ashwini madam and she is the best person we have met. She has immense knowledge & experience, is very patient, and answered all our doubts. Each and every phase of my pregnancy was very well taken care of. We are really happy at the happiest moment of our life and thanks a lot Dr. Ashwini madam for your expertise, and suggestions and for instilling confidence in us.We also thank Dr. Narmada Madam who was always reachable whenever we wanted and helped us throughout our pregnancy phase.And about Aspire clinic - all the staff i.e. front desk, admin, coordinators, nurses, and housekeeping are all really friendly and they always have a smile with them which makes us enter the clinic with a smile. All the appointments and tests were booked on time and it was really well taken care of. They take care of everything without any complaints or deviations.Overall, a very happy and wonderful experience. Thanks a lot, Aspire team :) I would genuinely suggest everyone looking to start their family to definitely visit Aspire.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a very good experience with Dr Ashwini ma'am, Dr. Narmatha ma'am and all the staff members they r all very friendly caring and quickly respond to any of the problems. Ashwini ma'am is highly professional, experienced and very particular about the treatment. Its only because of her after a long journey of infertility treatment in many hospitals that I have delivered a baby boy. A positive vibe is in this clinic as Dr gives hope. I have heard from many Dr's too about Ashwini mams dedication which is rare. I recommend everyone to visit consistently to get effective results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: a doctor needs to atleast listen to the patient. she did not read the reports even after sending her already. she was ready with the diagnosis in her mind and kept on repeating the same thing over and over again without letting the patient say much. Extremely bad experience. * ***** ***** ****** ******* ******** we went to another doc **** **** *** ****** *** ** **** **** *** *** ******** ** * ***** ** ***** **** ****** ** *** ** ******* ** ******* *** *** ** **** **** *** ** ****** **** ********** ** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly, Dr Ashwini has been extremely wonderful throughout our pregnancy and delivery. She definitely understands her patient's requirements and remembers their history well. *** **** *** ************* ********* ***** ** ***** *** ******** *** ***** ****** ***** *** ************** Our delivery experience with her was super smooth and we are thankful to her for being so patient with us.Secondly, the experience at her clinic has been great. There is very little wait time, both for tests or to meet the doctor. Even scans do not take very long. Hospitals on the other hand require you to wait long hours even to ask doctor basic questions. I will definitely recommend the doctor and her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: By reading all the reviews in the practo i thought to approach dr. Ashwini but once went there i really don't know what is happening in the hospital. Nurses will do only normal checkup like bp and weight but here we need to explain our problem everything with nurses only which is not at all a good thing for me, and they notice our problems, without consulting a doctor they suggested me to do pelvic scanning which i have 0 idea about it after that i met the doctor directly in scanning room she didn't even know about the things i explained to nurse, then they did scanning and asked me to wait after that she called me to consult and she said i have pcos and gave some medicines thats it, she didn't explained me anything about it and also she didn't tell some medicine how to use, my personal opinion is first every doctor should talk with the patients not nurses.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My wife came to know about Dr. Ashwini G B from Practo. She is extremely knowledgeable. She explains the problem and then resolves. The front desk staff and the medical assistant staff Archana, Panchami, Mary, Asha, Sreeja, Srivani were very nice and helpful. Dr. Narmatha spends as much time as needed with you to get all questions answered. Would highly recommend Aspire!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a very bad experience. Too highly charged *** ********* *** *** **** ** **** Was asked to do several tests ***** *** *** ********* Consultation charges and other charges were taken way before giving the consultation. Had to sit and wait for more than 60 mins . Till now wife did not get her periods it’s been two weeks now we visited and started medicines

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely happy with how fast everything was done because I have time constraint and getting everything done from pregnancy test to scanning to blood test to doctors visit everything was done superfast for me in the place where doc was visiting. Doctors visiting part came at the end where everything was done but she was very friendly and cooperative so I am extremely happy with practo for showing the perfect doc and fertility center.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Breast Examination,
review: The doctor is very friendly and she was always happy to answer my questions. I have been visiting her for 3 years now. I wanted to move to my native for my delivery later decided to stay back in Bangalore because I trusted her so much. My pregnancy, delivery was all smooth. I thank her for that. I continue to visit her even now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ******* ** * *** ** * ******* *** ********* ** *** ******** experience and quick decision making is commendable. We have been visiting her since last 1 yr or so and have been very happy with the way she has guided us. She is doing a wonderful job. She is also empathetic towards her patients and there is lot of personal care & attention on individual issues. This makes her different from the rest. Thanks a lot doctor..

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well we had an appointment at 1215 with doctor and we had to wait till 1 40 to get to our turn. There is no regard to earlier appointments and patients were treated on first come basis. in this time of corona, this much wait time is unacceptable. Also they charge 950 rs for a normal visit and not 800 as listed on practo

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm thrilled to share my positive experience with Dr. Ashwini who guided me through the IVF process with exceptional care and expertise. From the initial consultation to the successful outcome, Dr.Ashwini displayed professionalism, compassion, and a deep understanding of my concerns. The personalized approach, clear communication, and willingness to address any questions made me feel at ease throughout the journey. Thanks to Dr. Ashwini's expertise, I am now on the path to parenthood, and I couldn't be more grateful for the support I received. Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Found Aspire through Google reviews. Best fertility center according to us. The entire team is good and welcoming. Easy to find on maps and easy to park.**** ******* ** *** ** *** ***** She is very patient in answering any number of questions. In our case all the decisions she took were right. We are very thankful that she delivered our baby also. She sees every patient individually and that takes time but the wait is very much worth it. This is what we expect when we come to a specialist and that experience is fully given.
The entire support team led by Dr. Namratha is super fast and efficient. They make it a point to explain the process clearly so that you don't have any surprises. The embryologist is also in-house so all decisions are planned and executed well.
Big shout out to the front desk who always has a smile and greets you. Thank you all.
Will recommend Aspire Fertility and Dr. Ashwini to any and everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have got to know about this doctor through one of my friend. We thought to once visit and see as we have been trying for 3 years now. I am very thankful to both the doctors Ashwini Mam and Dr. Namratha. They have been very patient. Very well handled us, discussed well, ensured we don't panic or be afraid. Very smoothly handled all the tests. I must say thanks to all the sisters working there, they are very cooperative.. They don't show any difference and handle every patient with care. Atleast thats what i have experienced. I have been blessed with a cute baby now. Iam very happy with them

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: .I visited her for pregnancy checkup and told her to prescribe me multivitamins etc as i was unwell and feeling weak and she was like,We recommend it after 3 months.I faced serious low   Haemoglobin and what not.* ***** **** **** * ****** ** *** ******* **** ** **** ***** *** ***** ***** *** *** *** * ****** *************Infact i had serious low bp and she was like it will be fine on its own but then i consulted another gynaecologist *** *** ****** ****** ** **** *** ********** *** * *** ******* ****** ** **** **** * ********** ****** *** **** ******I had to go times and again *** **** ****** ********* **** *** ***** * ********* ** ********* ** * **** ***** ************ ** *** *****

Did a thorough check and advised regarding postmenopausal issues for 40+ years. All women should do this kind of check up for self care as this is again a very hormonal stage for all women. The doctor was helpful in managing my specific issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ashwini was very nice and polite.. had patience to to listen to my problems. 
Highly recommend her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hospital is clean and all the staffs are friendly. Dr. Ashwin is process oriented and focus on the results.  She is good in giving treatment . Overall it's good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had fertility treatment with Dr. Ashwini 3 years back and conceived in the second IUI with no unnecessary medicines and blessed with a beautiful baby girl. Completely satisfied. And now consulting again with Dr.Ashwini for my second baby

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She’s understanding and approachable... thank you for your diagnosis & prognosis. Really appreciate it.
**** **** ****** *** atmosphere is also verycalm there I really want to thanks doctors and full staff there
The doctor and the staff are very helpful. The check up was thorough and the doctor explained the issue well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr Ashwini is amicable, understanding and very relevant to each one's case.
Consultation with her boosts confidence.
Thank you alot Dr Ashwini.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to consult doctor, and waited more than 1 hour charged 800 rs just  write folic acid to take. And asked pay 1500 rs immediately and not all asked any details.*   ***** ******  ********** ** **** *** *** ** *** ***** *********
reply_text:
Hello ms Jaya Bhat , 
If you are not in a mood for civil behavior please do not visit us . We have zero tolerance for obnoxious behavior (neither with the doctor nor with the staff ).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Gives a detailed explanation, humble and friendly doctor. I really liked her approach of diagnosis and replies to all your silliest doubts very calmly and patiently. I really liked her and will approach her in future.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Too costly, within 2 visits paid ~30K *** *** ****** *** **********
She hardly spends 2 min with patients..

Not satisfied

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is great. She is professional and friendly at the same time. She explains the cause of your problem very well and suggests remedies for the same. I would highly recommend her. The only inconvenience is the waiting time. Aspire Fertility Clinic is always filled with a lot of patients waiting for Doctor's consultation, so you have to wait at least 40 mins to 1 hour to finally get to see the Doctor. But the wait is worth it.

Dr Ashwinini is very helpful and gave all the details very clearly. I was able to get pregnant sooner than I thought because of her help and guidance. The staff is incredibly helpful as well

I would highly recommended her.
The experience was good. The process took some time but they examined me very well. My vaginal boil is now gone

She is one of the friendliest doctors I have ever seen in my life. Explained the issue very well, Talked about all possible side effects and their cure. She is my go to doctor now for all pregnency related problems now
Doctor was helpful . Explained in detail about the next steps.. found the clinic little expensive as test ordered was much cheaper outside
Doctor that i booked for hardly talked with me for 2 mins the rest was done by someone else whats the point of keeping their name in the appointment then

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had visited for endometriosis and also fertility treatment.  Ashwini doctor is really a gem doctor,very straight forward, highly expertise in this area and friendly too. Th

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The staff was very helpful and diligent throughout. Dr. Gowdra was very kind, helpful and helped me understand the issue, and most of all - she was very reassuring. Highly recommend Dr. Gowdra and Aspire, exemplary work, team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Ashwini is very good with fertility treatment.She never said that it’s not gonna happen .She tried various treatments.I am blessed with baby boy now and ai recommend doctor Ashwini.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Happy with doctors diagnosis and suggestions. Will recommend and visit again. Clear explanation and nice clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was kind and understanding. Her observations and explanations are satisfactory.   I just started my pregnancy treatment with her. Hoping for the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ashwini is very patient and understands the root cause before beginning treatment. She pushed for natural way instead of the available methods and it worked for us in 3 months. We will definitely recommend Dr.Ashwini.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: She heard the full problem very patiently, and then advised the solution for it. I really liked the way she talked to us.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ****** ** **** **** *** listen to my problem carefully, takes immediate decision .The way Doctor explains the treatment part is excellent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Experience was good but waiting time despite the appointment . The doctor was friendly and facility is well equipped with the labs

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** *** ******* **** ***** Suggested all possible tests. And god blessed us a baby boy. Thank you so much mam for all your care.
Doctor was very friendly and explained clearly about the current situation and further procedures.
